subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Boatright had 20 points and Connecticut rallied from 5 points down in the second half to defeat Dayton, 75-64, during the semifinals in San Juan.
snippet: Ryan Boatright had 20 points and Connecticut rallied from 5 points down in the second half to defeat Dayton, 75-64, during the semifinals in San Juan.
